testcase.name: verifyBankTransactionTimeReport
testcase.system-out: SCROOLL UPTO ANALYTICS Click on Report Module Click on Bank Transaction Time Sub Module verify user is on the Bank Transaction Time Report todays date :- 10/07/2025 Converted Date: 10/07/2025 checking todays date are displays on this Bank transaction report page Click on Calendor Button in Calendor Click on Date Click on Apply Button in Calendor click on Select Bank Enter Merchnat bank name in a Search Bank name text field select merchant name :- Delhi select Bank from all Bank select Merchant Bank from all Merchant bank user enter time 0 Click on search Button in Calendor

testsuite.system-out: User enter ID in Username field User Enter Password in password field Click on submit button in login page SCROOLL UPTO ANALYTICS Click on Report Module Click on Bank Transaction Time Sub Module verify user is on the Bank Transaction Time Report todays date :- 10/07/2025 Converted Date: 10/07/2025 checking todays date are displays on this Bank transaction report page Click on Calendor Button in Calendor Click on Date Click on Apply Button in Calendor click on Select Bank Enter Merchnat bank name in a Search Bank name text field select merchant name :- Delhi select Bank from all Bank select Merchant Bank from all Merchant bank user enter time 0 Click on search Button in Calendor
